text: Muhammad Fatchurohman (born 28 June 1995), also known as Muhammad Fatchu Rochman or Fatchu Rochman, is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a left back for Liga 1 club Bhayangkara.Profil mengenal sosok M. Fatchu Rochman, idola baru warga Pasuruan ==Career== Fatchurohman playing football since he was a child. He started his junior debut in SSB Naga Gempol in Pasuruan. In 2010, he joined Persekap Pasuruan. And he played in Indonesia U-19 who coached by Indra Sjafri. ===Persebaya Bhayangkara=== In 2015, he joined Persebaya ISL (Bhayangkara) with Evan Dimas, Ilham Armaiyn, Putu Gede Juni Antara, Zulfiandi, Hargianto, and Sahrul Kurniawan. he was contracted for four years. == Honours == ===Club=== ;Bhayangkara * Liga 1: 2017 ===International=== ;Indonesia U-19 * AFF U-19 Youth Championship: 2013 ==References== ==External links== * * Fatchu Rochman at Flashscore.com * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:People from Pasuruan Category:Persebaya Surabaya players Category:Bhayangkara F.C. players Category:Liga 2 (Indonesia) players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Sportspeople from East Java Category:Association football defenders
title: Muhammad Fatchurohman
